code: import Cookies from"universal-cookie";import{serverApi}from"../../lib/config";var cookie=new Cookies();var member_data=null;if(cookie.get("access_token")){var memberDataJson=localStorage.getItem("member_data")?localStorage.getItem("member_data"):null;member_data=memberDataJson?JSON.parse(memberDataJson):null;if(member_data){member_data.mb_image=member_data.mb_image?"".concat(serverApi,"/").concat(member_data.mb_image):"/auth/profile.svg";}}else{localStorage.removeItem("member_data");}console.log("== verify ==");console.log(member_data);export var verifiedMemberData=member_data?member_data:null;
